ValidationRule.description: User incorrectly populated TRID Disclosure Category and TRID Tolerances Category fields for the following fee types: General Credits, Cost to Cure, Down Payment, Earnest Money/Deposit.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( LLC_BI__Loan__r.LLC_BI__Product_Reference__r.LLC_BI__Product_Feature__r.LLC_BI__Is_Subject_To_TRID_Tolerances__c, OR(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(LLC_BI__TRID_Disclosure_Category__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(LLC_BI__TRID_Tolerances_Category__c)))), OR( ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Fee_Type__c , 'Lender Credit'), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Fee_Type__c , 'Cost to Cure'), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Fee_Type__c , 'Seller Credit'), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Fee_Type__c , 'Earnest Money/Deposit'), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Fee_Type__c , 'Down Payment'), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Fee_Type__c , 'Other Credit'), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Fee_Type__c , 'Funds For Borrower') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: TRID Disclosure and Tolerance categories are only required for Fees and Costs. To continue, remove any category values from non applicable fee types.
